intro: Psychotria expansissima, commonly known as the "Amazonian psychotria," is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the rainforests of South America, particularly in Brazil, Peru, and Colombia. The plant is characterized by its dark green, glossy leaves and clusters of small, white to pale yellow flowers. It thrives in humid, shaded environments and is often found in the understory of tropical forests. Psychotria expansissima is also noted for its medicinal properties and has been used in traditional healing practices by indigenous communities.
